cards.name: Bear Island Host
cards.text: Bestow (3). No attachments. Action: Discard 1 gold from Bear Island Host to choose a House Mormont character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

cards.name: Marriage Pact
cards.text: Terminal. Attached character cannot participate in challenges against you. Forced Interrupt: When attached character leaves play, sacrifice a character you control.

cards.name: Knight of the Reach
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Knight of the Reach is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lady character. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: "Lord Renly's Ride"
cards.text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR and gains intimidate. X is the printed STR of the top character in your dead pile.

cards.name: Gilly
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Gilly to choose a Steward character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

cards.name: Guarding the Realm
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, pay 1 gold to return Guarding the Realm from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Melisandre
cards.text: Insight. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose an opponent and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.

cards.name: Light of the Lord
cards.text: [baratheon] or R'hllor character only. Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand attached character and gain 1 gold.

cards.name: Polliver
cards.text: Pillage. Reaction: After Polliver discards a character using pillage, return 2 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to the treasury.

cards.name: The Hand's Solar
cards.text: Action: Kneel The Hand's Solar to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an [intrigue] icon.

cards.name: Wex Pyke
cards.text: Bestow (8). While Wex Pyke is attacking, each character with printed cost X cannot be declared as a defender. X is the number of gold Wex Pyke has. Dominance Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Wex Pyke. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Iron Islands Market
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Market to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 8 or more cards in his or her discard pile.)

cards.name: Second Sons
cards.text: Bestow (3). Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, sacrifice Second Sons unless you discard 1 gold from it.

cards.name: A Dragon Is No Slave
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a character without attachments. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the phase. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen, pay 1 gold to return A Dragon Is No Slave from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Orphan of the Greenblood
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Orphan of the Greenblood to return another character you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Scorching Deserts
cards.text: Reaction: After a character with fewer than 2 challenge icons is declared as an attacker or defender, kneel and sacrifice Scorching Deserts to remove that character from the challenge.

cards.name: Black Walder
cards.text:
Bestow (3).
During the third challenge you initiate each phase, Black Walder gains renown and gets +2 STR for each gold he has.

cards.name: Great Hall
cards.text: Limited. Marshaling Action: Kneel Great Hall to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)

cards.name: "The Dornishman's Wife"
cards.text: Action: Choose an opponent. If that player has a higher power total than you, gain 2 gold. If that player has more cards in his or her hand than you, gain 1 power for your faction. If that player controls more characters than you, draw 1 card.

cards.name: The Annals of Castle Black
cards.text: Each player may play events in his or her discard pile as if they were in his or her hand. Forced Reaction: After an event is placed in a discard pile, remove it from the game.
